Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to serial acts of public lewdness.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing certain penalties for the offense of public lewdness.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the Penal Law to categorize the crime of public lewdness as a class A misdemeanor, and to amend the Correction Law to include multiple or serial acts of public lewdness and public lewdness in the presence of an individual less than eighteen years of age as registerable sex offenses.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Categorize the crime of public lewdness as a class A misdemeanor.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to serial acts of public lewdness.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing certain penalties for the offense of public lewdness.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the Penal Law to categorize the crime of public lewdness as a class A misdemeanor, and to amend the Correction Law to include multiple or serial acts of public lewdness and public lewdness in the presence of an individual less than eighteen years of age as registerable sex offenses.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Categorize the crime of public lewdness as a class A misdemeanor.
